overview:
Dr. Jayanthy’s penchant for precision and quality ensures clients’ experience the best of Breast Surgery Chennai and cosmetic solutions available. She synthesizes with her patients to gain well rounded cognizance of their requirements and offers a solution that is aesthetically, cosmetically and emotionally approving. The capacious and progressive cosmetic solutions are offered at state-of-the-art technology platforms guaranteeing positive and effective results.

KAUVERY HOSPITAL
